title: Portrait of Sir Thomas Miller, Lord Glenlee
credit_line: J. Willis Dalzell Memorial Collection, gift of Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell
provenance_text:
Sir Henry Raeburn [1756-1823], Edinburgh, Scotland. A. Miller, Esq., Headley Cote, Barnet, Hertsfordshire, England; sold at Tooth Brothers, London, England by 1919; purchased by Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell (Mary Beer Dalzell) [1844-1929], Pittsburgh, PA  in 1919 until February 6, 1925; her gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1925.

Updated and under review by CGK
